Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor and the Waterfront Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and sets up a mystery involving playboys, G-Men, and suspicious activities at the waterfront, leading to Duke transforming into the Human Meteor.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Taxi Ride
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Human Meteor on the cover and transitions to Duke, the taxi driver, picking up suspicious playboys who want to go to the waterfront.

Major_Arcs.title: Toby's Stowaway Mission and Yacht Investigation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Toby stowing away on the yacht 'Marlin' under Duke's instructions, his discovery of a depth chart, and the dangers he faces as he uncovers a submarine plot.

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor vs. G-Men and Toby's Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Human Meteor confronting the G-Men, police praising Human Meteor, and shifts to Duke planning Toby's stowaway mission on the yacht 'Marlin'.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration and Danger
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Toby (as Pete) on the yacht, discovering a marked depth chart, being pushed overboard, and then realizing the submarine connection.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Marked Depth Chart
Reporting to the Captain and Recognition

Major_Arcs.title: Namor's Underwater Battle and Ship Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Namor's intervention based on Toby's information, his underwater fight with divers, attack on the ship, and confrontation with the yacht crew.

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Dive and Underwater Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Namor diving, discovering the submarine torpedo operation, and engaging in combat with the divers.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor's Urgent Dive and Submarine Discovery
Underwater Torpedo Operation and Namor's Realization
Targeting the Submarine with a Torpedo

sub_scenes.title: Ship Attack and Yacht Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the ship crew reacting to the underwater explosion, Namor deciding to attack the ship, and finally confronting the yacht crew.

narrative_arcs.title: Ship Crew Reacts to Peter's Fate and Geyser
Namor Reaches the Yacht and Confronts the Crew
Searching for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Presenting the Depth Map to the Captain

sub_scenes.title: Escape and Toby's Recovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Namor, Duke, and Toby escaping, Toby's hospital visit and recovery, and their return home, concluding this yacht-submarine arc.

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and the Bus Company Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to the Liberty Lads fighting Nazis and then transitions to Skip and Chuck uncovering a Nazi spy ring operating out of a bus company.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads and Ambulance Mystery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Liberty Lads in combat and then shifts to Skip and Chuck observing an ambulance at a neighbor's house, starting a new mystery.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Discovery and Bus Garage Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Skip and Chuck finding a dropped wallet, discovering a bus company address, and investigating the bus garage, encountering Major Bronson.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Attempt to Return Dropped Wallet
Discovery of the Wallet and Bus Company Address
Marine Salute and Major Bronson's Identity
Explanation of Major Bronson's Civilian Clothes

sub_scenes.title: Bus Company Confrontation and Bronson's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Skip and Chuck's arrival at the bus company, their encounter with Mr. Horst, and the escalating danger culminating in Bronson's betrayal of Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Returning the Wallet to the Bus Company
Mr. Horst's Abrupt Arrival and Confrontation
Close-up of Mr. Horst's Menacing Face

sub_scenes.title: Bronson's Downfall and Marine Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the fight against Bronson, his betrayal by henchmen, the Marine rescue, and the revelation of the Nazi spy ring.

narrative_arcs.title: Major's Injury and Urgent Medical Aid

Major_Arcs.title: South American Intrigue and Rosita's Kidnapping
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc transitions to a South American setting, introducing 'The Champ' and Henry, who get caught in a kidnapping plot involving Rosita, the President's daughter, and the bandit El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: Desert Flashback and South American Setting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with a desert flashback of 'The Champ' and Henry and then establishes their current location in a South American town.

narrative_arcs.title: Establishment of a South American Town Setting

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Confrontation and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the army officers confronting 'The Champ' and Henry in their hotel room and reveals the kidnapping of Rosita by El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Hotel Room Standoff and Abrupt Departure

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Ransom and Abduction of The Champ and Henry
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals El Tigre's Axis connection and ransom demand and shows 'The Champ' and Henry being abducted and taken to Mama.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Ransom and Axis Connection
Arrival at the House and Introduction to 'Mama'

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Rescue of Rosita
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the plan to infiltrate El Tigre's hideout, the distraction of guards, and the eventual rescue of Rosita amidst combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout
Execution of the Rear Entrance Plan
Machine Gun Threat and Champ's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan and the Submarine Detector Plans
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to Devil Dog Dolan, focusing on his jungle combat, Captain Lawton's compromised position due to his son's kidnapping, and Dolan's efforts to retrieve the submarine detector plans.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Captain's Dilemma
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat and then reveals Captain Lawton's desperate situation and compromised orders due to his son's kidnapping.

narrative_arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in Action: Jungle Combat

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Native Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dolan infiltrating the jungle, being observed, sensing danger, and then being ambushed by natives.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture, and Shipboard Brawl
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Dolan's capture, torture for the plans, his arson attempt, jungle fight with natives, and shipboard brawl, culminating in corporal punishment.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Candy Store Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins, Diane and Dan, and their investigation into a murder case, leading them through a candy store and hospital to uncover a complex racketeering plot and community heroism.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and Murder Assignment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins in an urban setting and sets up their assignment to investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and the Threat

sub_scenes.title: Police Inquiry and Hospital Visit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dan and Diane gathering information from the police and then visiting the hospital to investigate further, focusing on Reilly's sick child.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with the Nurse and Revelation of Sick Girl

sub_scenes.title: Racketeering Suspicions and Blood Type Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves Dan and Diane suspecting Barnacci's racketeering and reveals the crucial need for Farnacci's blood for Reilly's daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Reilly's Daughter and the Need for Farnacci's Blood
Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store
Arrival in Irish Section and Reilly Pursuit

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Search and Gunman Attack
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dan and Diane's unsuccessful search in the Irish section, their encounter with Mrs. Murphy revealing key information, and a sudden gunman attack.

narrative_arcs.title: Unfruitful Search for Reilly in Irish Section
Encounter with Mrs. Murphy and Revelation of Reilly's Daughter's Plight

sub_scenes.title: Community Chase and Blood Transfusion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the community's intervention to stop the gunman, the urgent need for blood donation, and the successful blood transfusion for Reilly's daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Dan Intervenes and Confronts Gunman on Car Roof
Police Arrival and Apprehension of Criminals
Awaiting News and Doctor's Diagnosis at the Hospital
Blood Donation Offer and Compatibility Issue
Urgent Call for Blood and Community Mobilization at Hospital
Blood Type Confirmation and Donor Preparation
The Life-Saving Transfusion and Immediate Revival
Post-Transfusion Observation and Anticipation of Recovery
Planning Farnacci's Capture and Police Pursuit
Forced Blood Donation and Birthday Celebration for Recovery
